CHAT.comment: Book Reading to Mot--The Very Hungry Caterpillar

context notes say Mot and Chi sit on floor next to each other. Mot holds down page and turns them. She makes a few comments , but doesn't have to help Chi to read. Chi has a smile on her face while reading and really seems to enjoy the story. Chi reads very clearly and fluently and doesn't have trouble with any of the words. Mot and Chi laugh together and seem to have an enjoyable time.

u.a: MOT and Chi laugh softly after turning page
